column4: Is there a good dreamweaver alternative for ubuntu, or should I keep a second computer around with windows on it?
there are a couple of WYSIWYG HTML editors for linux... try Kompozer, Bluefish or Quanta Plus
just to make a basic CSS/html website to hold my resume and such. no flash or anything. I'm trying to uninstall windows to keep myself from playing games and focusing on junior year of college/career
though... they're not as WYSIWYG as Dreamweaver... still... I personally find it easier to write web sites in a text editor
